Instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. In another bowl, mix together the sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract until well combined. Add the melted butter and buttermilk to the egg mixture and whisk until smooth. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.

In a separate bowl, mix baking soda, salt, and 1 cup buttermilk. Gradually combine the buttermilk mixture into the batter, alternating with the remaining 1 cup of buttermilk, and continue mixing until well incorporated.

Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
